About our TeamWe are building massively distributed systems at a web scale!At Cohesity, We are looking for innovative Engineers who are up for the challenge of leading, designing, and building a wide range of distributed systems and architecture. We look for outstanding minds who love to go deep and will go above and beyond the call to tackle big problems, step up to big challenges and who have no problem rolling up their sleeves to write code!What we're looking for:BS/MS/Ph.D. in Computer Science10+ years of strong experience in building production software productsExpertise in crafting/building large-scale distributed systems to scaleExpert Programming skills in one or more of the following languages: C, C++, GolangStrong, proven analytical and problem-solving skillsStrong data structures, design, algorithms, and coding skillsExpertise in: the public cloud, moving huge data sets, massively parallel and distributed data sets, and scalabilityPrevious experience in Cloud Services, Filesystems, or Data Protection is a huge plusMotivated to solve complex problems and challenges.Natural mentoring and coaching qualitiesOpenings are for experienced senior level Engineers who can take the lead on projects and are driven to own problems to a solution.
